widgets.name: AutocompleteCore
widgets.description: A widget that implements the core autocomplete functionality.

widgets.name: Badge
widgets.description: A Material Design badge that can be overlaid on another widget.

widgets.name: Banner
widgets.description: A Material Design banner that displays an important message and optional actions.

widgets.name: BottomSheet
widgets.description: A Material Design bottom sheet that slides up from the bottom of the screen.

widgets.name: ButtonBar
widgets.description: A horizontal arrangement of buttons with specific layout rules.

widgets.name: CupertinoButton
widgets.description: An iOS-style button.

widgets.name: CupertinoNavigationBar
widgets.description: An iOS-style navigation bar.

widgets.name: DataTable
widgets.description: A Material Design data table that shows data using rows and columns.

widgets.name: DatePicker
widgets.description: A Material Design date picker dialog.

widgets.name: DragTarget
widgets.description: A widget that receives data when a Draggable widget is dropped.

widgets.name: Draggable
widgets.description: A widget that can be dragged from one place to another.

widgets.name: AnimatedAlign
widgets.description: Animated version of Align that gradually changes its values over a period.

widgets.name: AnimatedBuilder
widgets.description: A widget that rebuilds when an Animation changes value.

widgets.name: AnimatedContainer
widgets.description: A container that gradually changes its values over a period.

widgets.name: AnimatedCrossFade
widgets.description: A widget that cross-fades between two given children.

widgets.name: AnimatedDefaultTextStyle
widgets.description: Animated version of DefaultTextStyle that automatically transitions the default text style.

widgets.name: AnimatedList
widgets.description: A scrolling container that animates items when they are inserted or removed.

widgets.name: AnimatedOpacity
widgets.description: Animated version of Opacity that gradually changes its value over a period.

widgets.name: AnimatedPositioned
widgets.description: Animated version of Positioned that automatically transitions the child's position.

widgets.name: AnimatedSize
widgets.description: A widget that automatically transitions its size over a given duration.

widgets.name: AppBar
widgets.description: A Material Design app bar.

widgets.name: AspectRatio
widgets.description: A widget that attempts to size the child to a specific aspect ratio.

widgets.name: BackdropFilter
widgets.description: A widget that applies a filter to the existing painted content.

widgets.name: BottomNavigationBar
widgets.description: A material widget displayed at the bottom of an app for selecting among a small number of views.

widgets.name: Card
widgets.description: A Material Design card: a panel with slightly rounded corners and an elevation shadow.

widgets.name: Center
widgets.description: A widget that centers its child within itself.

widgets.name: Chip
widgets.description: A Material Design chip: a compact element that represents an attribute, text, entity, or action.

widgets.name: ClipOval
widgets.description: A widget that clips its child using an oval.

widgets.name: ClipPath
widgets.description: A widget that clips its child using a path.

widgets.name: ClipRect
widgets.description: A widget that clips its child using a rectangle.

widgets.name: ClipRRect
widgets.description: A widget that clips its child using a rounded rectangle.

widgets.name: Column
widgets.description: A widget that displays its children in a vertical array.

widgets.name: Container
widgets.description: A convenience widget that combines common painting, positioning, and sizing widgets.

widgets.name: CustomPaint
widgets.description: A widget that provides a canvas on which to draw during the paint phase.

widgets.name: DecoratedBox
widgets.description: A widget that paints a Decoration either before or after its child paints.

widgets.name: DefaultTextStyle
widgets.description: A widget that specifies the default text style for its descendants.

widgets.name: Divider
widgets.description: A thin horizontal line, with padding on either side.

widgets.name: Drawer
widgets.description: A Material Design panel that slides in horizontally from the edge of a Scaffold.

widgets.name: Expanded
widgets.description: A widget that expands a child of a Row, Column, or Flex.

widgets.name: FittedBox
widgets.description: Scales and positions its child within itself.

widgets.name: Flexible
widgets.description: A widget that controls how a child of a Row, Column, or Flex flexes.

widgets.name: FloatingActionButton
widgets.description: A circular button that hovers over content to promote a primary action in the application.

widgets.name: Form
widgets.description: A container for grouping together multiple form field widgets.

widgets.name: GestureDetector
widgets.description: A widget that detects gestures.

widgets.name: GridView
widgets.description: A scrollable, 2D array of widgets.

widgets.name: Hero
widgets.description: A widget that marks its child as being a candidate for hero animations.

widgets.name: Image
widgets.description: A widget that displays an image.

widgets.name: InkWell
widgets.description: A rectangular area of a Material that responds to touch.

widgets.name: ListView
widgets.description: A scrollable list of widgets arranged linearly.

widgets.name: MediaQuery
widgets.description: Establishes a subtree in which media queries resolve to the given data.

widgets.name: Padding
widgets.description: A widget that insets its child by the given padding.

widgets.name: PopupMenuButton
widgets.description: A button that shows a popup menu when pressed.

widgets.name: Row
widgets.description: A widget that displays its children in a horizontal array.

widgets.name: Scaffold
widgets.description: Implements the basic Material Design visual layout structure.

widgets.name: SingleChildScrollView
widgets.description: A box in which a single widget can be scrolled.

widgets.name: SizedBox
widgets.description: A box with a specified size.

widgets.name: Spacer
widgets.description: Creates an adjustable, empty spacer that can be used to tune the spacing between widgets.

widgets.name: Stack
widgets.description: A widget that positions its children relative to the edges of its box.

widgets.name: StatefulWidget
widgets.description: A widget that has mutable state.

widgets.name: StatelessWidget
widgets.description: A widget that does not require mutable state.

widgets.name: TabBar
widgets.description: A Material Design widget that displays a horizontal row of tabs.

widgets.name: Text
widgets.description: A run of text with a single style.

widgets.name: TextField
widgets.description: A Material Design text field.

widgets.name: Visibility
widgets.description: A widget that shows or hides its child.

widgets.name: Wrap
widgets.description: A widget that displays its children in multiple horizontal or vertical runs.

widgets.name: CircularProgressIndicator
widgets.description: A Material Design circular progress indicator, which spins to indicate that the application is busy.

widgets.name: Icon
widgets.description: A graphical icon widget drawn with a glyph from a font.

widgets.name: LinearProgressIndicator
widgets.description: A Material Design linear progress indicator, which displays progress along a line.

widgets.name: ListTile
widgets.description: A single fixed-height row that typically contains text as well as a leading or trailing icon.

widgets.name: MaterialApp
widgets.description: An application that uses Material Design.

widgets.name: NavigationBar
widgets.description: A Material Design 3 navigation bar, which is displayed at the bottom of the screen.

widgets.name: NavigationRail
widgets.description: A Material Design 3 navigation rail, which is displayed on the left or right side of the screen.

widgets.name: Opacity
widgets.description: A widget that makes its child partially transparent.

widgets.name: OutlinedButton
widgets.description: A Material Design outlined button.

widgets.name: PageView
widgets.description: A scrollable list that works page by page.

widgets.name: Positioned
widgets.description: A widget that controls where a child of a Stack is positioned.

widgets.name: PreferredSize
widgets.description: A widget with a preferred size that configures its child's layout constraints.

widgets.name: RadioListTile
widgets.description: A ListTile with a Radio widget.

widgets.name: RawMaterialButton
widgets.description: A Material Design button without pre-configured styles.

widgets.name: RefreshIndicator
widgets.description: A Material Design pull-to-refresh indicator.

widgets.name: SelectableText
widgets.description: A run of selectable text with a single style.

widgets.name: Slider
widgets.description: A Material Design slider input.

widgets.name: Switch
widgets.description: A Material Design switch that toggles between on and off.

widgets.name: TabBarView
widgets.description: A page view that displays the widget which corresponds to the currently selected tab.

widgets.name: Table
widgets.description: A widget that uses the table layout algorithm for its children.

widgets.name: TextButton
widgets.description: A Material Design text button.

widgets.name: TextFormField
widgets.description: A Material Design text field that integrates with the Form widget.

widgets.name: Theme
widgets.description: Applies a theme to descendant widgets.

widgets.name: TimePicker
widgets.description: A Material Design time picker dialog.

widgets.name: Transform
widgets.description: A widget that applies a transformation before painting its child.

widgets.name: VerticalDivider
widgets.description: A thin vertical line, with padding on either side.

widgets.name: WillPopScope
widgets.description: A widget that registers a callback to veto attempts by the user to dismiss the enclosing Navigator.

widgets.name: Dismissible
widgets.description: A widget that can be dismissed by dragging in the indicated direction.

widgets.name: ReorderableListView
widgets.description: A list whose items the user can interactively reorder by dragging.

widgets.name: SafeArea
widgets.description: A widget that insets its child by sufficient padding to avoid intrusions by the operating system.

widgets.name: Scrollbar
widgets.description: A Material Design scrollbar that indicates which portion of a scrollable widget is currently visible.

widgets.name: SnackBar
widgets.description: A lightweight message with an optional action which briefly displays at the bottom of the screen.

widgets.name: RichText
widgets.description: A paragraph of rich text that supports multiple styles within the text.

widgets.name: Placeholder
widgets.description: A widget that draws a box that represents where other widgets will one day be added.

widgets.name: OverflowBox
widgets.description: A widget that imposes different constraints on its child than it gets from its parent.

widgets.name: LimitedBox
widgets.description: A box that limits its size only when it's unconstrained.

widgets.name: ConstrainedBox
widgets.description: A widget that imposes additional constraints on its child.

widgets.name: IndexedStack
widgets.description: A Stack that shows a single child from a list of children.

widgets.name: Flow
widgets.description: A widget that implements the flow layout algorithm.

widgets.name: CustomScrollView
widgets.description: A ScrollView that creates custom scroll effects using slivers.

widgets.name: SliverAppBar
widgets.description: A Material Design app bar that integrates with a CustomScrollView.

widgets.name: SliverList
widgets.description: A sliver that places multiple box children in a linear array.

widgets.name: SliverGrid
widgets.description: A sliver that places multiple box children in a two dimensional arrangement.

widgets.name: ExpansionTile
widgets.description: A tile that expands or collapses when tapped, revealing or hiding a child widget.

widgets.name: CheckboxListTile
widgets.description: A ListTile with a Checkbox.

widgets.name: Stepper
widgets.description: A Material Design stepper widget that displays progress through a sequence of steps.

widgets.name: CupertinoPageScaffold
widgets.description: An iOS-style page scaffold that provides a navigation bar and content area.

widgets.name: FractionallySizedBox
widgets.description: A widget that sizes its child to a fraction of the total available space.

widgets.name: FutureBuilder
widgets.description: Widget that builds itself based on the latest snapshot of interaction with a Future.

widgets.name: IconButton
widgets.description: A Material Design icon button.

widgets.name: InheritedWidget
widgets.description: Base class for widgets that efficiently propagate information down the tree.

widgets.name: InteractiveViewer
widgets.description: A widget that enables pan and zoom interactions with its child.

widgets.name: LayoutBuilder
widgets.description: Builds a widget tree that can depend on the parent widget's size.

widgets.name: MaterialBanner
widgets.description: A Material Design banner that displays at the top of the screen.

widgets.name: NavigationDrawer
widgets.description: A Material Design navigation drawer that slides in horizontally.

widgets.name: OrientationBuilder
widgets.description: Builds a widget tree that can depend on the parent widget's orientation.

widgets.name: PopupRoute
widgets.description: A route that displays a popup above the current contents of the app.

widgets.name: ProgressIndicator
widgets.description: A base class for Material Design progress indicators.

widgets.name: RawKeyboardListener
widgets.description: A widget that calls a callback whenever the user presses or releases a key on a keyboard.

widgets.name: StreamBuilder
widgets.description: Widget that builds itself based on the latest snapshot of interaction with a Stream.

widgets.name: ValueListenableBuilder
widgets.description: A widget that rebuilds when a ValueListenable changes value.

widgets.name: CupertinoActionSheet
widgets.description: An iOS-style action sheet that presents the user with a set of alternatives.

widgets.name: CupertinoContextMenu
widgets.description: An iOS-style context menu that appears when the user long-presses a widget.

widgets.name: CupertinoDatePicker
widgets.description: An iOS-style date picker widget.

widgets.name: CupertinoScrollbar
widgets.description: An iOS-style scrollbar that indicates which portion of a scrollable widget is currently visible.

widgets.name: CupertinoSwitch
widgets.description: An iOS-style switch that toggles between on and off.

widgets.name: MouseRegion
widgets.description: A widget that tracks the movement of mice and trackpads.

widgets.name: NotificationListener
widgets.description: A widget that listens for Notifications bubbling up the tree.

widgets.name: PhysicalModel
widgets.description: A widget that applies a physical model to its child such as a shadow.

widgets.name: PhysicalShape
widgets.description: A widget that applies a physical model to an arbitrary shape.

widgets.name: RotatedBox
widgets.description: A widget that rotates its child by a integral number of quarter turns.

widgets.name: ShaderMask
widgets.description: A widget that applies a shader to its child.

widgets.name: SliverPadding
widgets.description: A sliver that applies padding on each side of another sliver.

widgets.name: SliverToBoxAdapter
widgets.description: A sliver that contains a single box widget.

widgets.name: ToggleButtons
widgets.description: A Material Design toggle button group.

widgets.name: Tooltip
widgets.description: A widget that displays a message when the user long-presses a widget.
